events.name: onClose
events.description: Callback fired when the select popover is closed.

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: Callback fired when the select popover is opened or closed.

events.name: onSelectionChange
events.description: Callback fired when the selected keys change.

events.name: onChange
events.description: Native select change event, fired when the selected value changes.

events.name: renderValue
events.description: Function to render the value of the select. It renders the selected item by default.

children.description: The children to render. Usually a list of `SelectItem` and `SelectSection` elements.

selectionMode.description: The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.

selectedKeys.description: The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).

disabledKeys.description: The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.

defaultSelectedKeys.description: The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).

label.description: The content to display as the label.

description.description: A description for the select. Provides a hint such as specific requirements for what to choose.

errorMessage.description: An error message for the select.

startContent.description: Element to be rendered in the left side of the select.

endContent.description: Element to be rendered in the right side of the select.

selectorIcon.description: Element to be rendered as the selector icon.

scrollRef.description: A ref to the scrollable element.

spinnerRef.description: A ref to the spinner element.

fullWidth.description: Whether the select should take up the width of its parent.

isOpen.description: Whether the select is open by default (controlled).

defaultOpen.description: Whether the select is open by default (uncontrolled).

isRequired.description: Whether user select is required on the select before form submission.

isMultiline.description: Whether the select should allow multiple lines of text.

validationState.description: Whether the select should display its "valid" or "invalid" visual styling. (**Deprecated**) use **isInvalid** instead.

showScrollIndicators.description: Whether the select should show scroll indicators when the listbox is scrollable.

autoFocus.description: Whether the select should be focused on the first mount.

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the collection allows empty selection.

disableAnimation.description: Whether the select should be animated.

disableSelectionIconRotation.description: Whether the select should disable the rotation of the selector icon.

popoverProps.description: Props to be passed to the popover component.

listboxProps.description: Props to be passed to the listbox component.

scrollShadowProps.description: Props to be passed to the scroll shadow component.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the dropdown item slots.
